summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena requires personal appearance on November 29, 2021, at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which the subpoena is issued to compel testimony.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear in court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 12, 2021, by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The subpoena compels an individual to testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The required court appearance was scheduled for November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.
Failure to comply would constitute contempt of court and subject the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena was signed by United States Attorney Audrey Strauss.
